We can hold this model for 48 hours if you want to try the repair first - at least you have a backup plan.

educational.title: Why Your Mower Blade Direction Actually Matters
educational.hook: Installing your mower blade upside down can cost you $300. Here's why.
educational.body: The blade's lift wing creates suction that pulls grass up for a clean cut. Upside down? You're just beating grass down and stressing your engine. Look for the stamped 'THIS SIDE UP' or check which side has the angled lift wing. Install it wings facing the deck, cutting edge facing the ground. This simple check prevents engine damage, uneven cuts, and early blade replacement.

educational.title: The 2-Minute Carburetor Save That Prevents $200 Repairs
educational.hook: This 30-second step before winter storage saves most small engine repairs.
educational.body: Old gas turns to varnish in 30 days and clogs your carburetor jets. Before storing any equipment, run it dry or add fuel stabilizer. Here's how: Add stabilizer to your tank, run the engine for 5 minutes to circulate it through, then either run it completely dry or leave it with treated fuel. Come spring, your equipment starts first pull instead of needing a $200 carburetor cleaning.

educational.title: Read Your Spark Plug Like a Mechanic
educational.hook: Your spark plug tells you exactly what's wrong with your engine.
educational.body: Pull your spark plug and look at the tip. Light tan or gray? Perfect. Black and sooty? You're running too rich - check your air filter. White or blistered? Running too lean or overheating. Wet with gas? Flooding issue. Oil-fouled? Worn piston rings. This 2-minute check diagnoses most engine problems before they become expensive.

contractor_network.value_proposition: Landscapers recommend quality equipment to clients, we handle sales/service, they earn passive income
contractor_network.implementation: Unique referral codes, monthly commission checks, co-branded marketing materials

seasonal_referral_contests.contest: Customer who refers most new customers wins [premium equipment item]
seasonal_referral_contests.secondary_prizes: All referrers entered in drawing for additional prizes
seasonal_referral_contests.promotion: Leaderboard in store, social media updates, creates competitive engagement

neighborhood_ambassador_program.concept: Identify enthusiastic customers in key neighborhoods
neighborhood_ambassador_program.offer: Exclusive discounts + early access to new products in exchange for neighborhood advocacy
neighborhood_ambassador_program.mechanism: Yard signs during peak season, neighborhood social media groups, local events
neighborhood_ambassador_program.retention: Special status recognition, community building, brand visibility

google_review_incentive.offer: Leave honest Google review, get entered in monthly drawing for $100 service credit
google_review_incentive.compliance: Emphasize honest review, no payment for positive reviews
google_review_incentive.implementation: QR code on receipts, follow-up email after service, in-store signage
google_review_incentive.value: Builds online reputation, SEO benefit, social proof for new customers

commercial_referral_network.incentive: Tiered rewards - 1-3 referrals: $100 credit, 4-6 referrals: $250 credit, 7+ referrals: $500 credit
commercial_referral_network.targeting: Landscapers know other landscapers, property managers know other property managers
commercial_referral_network.tracking: Formal referral agreements, quarterly reward payouts

real_estate_partnerships.strategy: Partner with realtors and property managers
real_estate_partnerships.offer: Preferred vendor status, special pricing for their clients
real_estate_partnerships.referral_value: New homeowners need equipment, property managers need ongoing service
real_estate_partnerships.implementation: Co-branded new homeowner packages, realtor referral cards, property manager service agreements
